name: Best Ever Chili Seasoning (3pk)
summary: Nothing beats a comforting bowl of chili packed with protein and pantry staples on those cold winter nights. This one comes together in under 20 minutes and bursts with flavour, thanks to a perfect blend of chilies, spices, and cocoa powder. Best of all, it’s versatile! Use your choice of ground meat, canned or fresh tomatoes, and swap out the beans for whatever you have on hand—no fuss, no muss, and always a good choice!
